tool_description: An API showing all the latest Climate Change News around the world.
name: MindTrack Solutions Inc Climate Change Live
title: MindTrack Solutions Inc Climate Change Live
tool_name: MindTrack Solutions Inc Climate Change Live

api_list.name: Get Climate Change News from Individual source
api_list.description: Gets News about Climate Change from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mindtrack-solutions-inc-climate-change-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mindtrack-solutions-inc-climate-change-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
